name: @Install_APMULTI_Demo2_realtime
author: AFNI Team
description: Fetches the demo data and scripts corresponding to AFNI's Demo #2 for experimenting with AFNI's real-time system.

inputs.description: Use wget to download the archive. By default, the script prefers curl.
inputs.name: Use wget

inputs.description: Use curl to download the archive. By default, the script prefers curl.
inputs.name: Use curl
